derivation: from H2520 (חֶלְקַת) and the plural of H6697 (צוּר), with the article inserted; smoothness of the rocks;
outline:
Helkath-hazzurim = "field of swords"
  1. a place near the pool of Gibeon where Ishbosheth's men were killed by David's men under Joab
strongs_def: Chelkath Hats-tsurim, a place in Palestine
